[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-mapview](./harp-mapview.md) &gt; [MaterialOptions](./harp-mapview.materialoptions.md)

## MaterialOptions interface

The structure of the options to pass into \[\[createMaterial\]\].

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface MaterialOptions 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [env](./harp-mapview.materialoptions.env.md) | [Env](./harp-datasource-protocol.env.md) | Environment used to evaluate dynamic technique attributes.<!-- -->Usually \[\[MapView.mapEnv\]\]. |
|  [fog](./harp-mapview.materialoptions.fog.md) | boolean | <code>RawShaderMaterial</code> instances need to know about the fog at instantiation in order to avoid recompiling them manually later (ThreeJS does not update fog for <code>RawShaderMaterial</code>s). |
|  [shadowsEnabled](./harp-mapview.materialoptions.shadowsenabled.md) | boolean | Whether shadows are enabled or not, this is required because we change the material used. |
|  [skipExtraProps](./harp-mapview.materialoptions.skipextraprops.md) | string\[\] | Properties to skip. \[\[applyTechniqueToMaterial\]\] |
|  [technique](./harp-mapview.materialoptions.technique.md) | [Technique](./harp-datasource-protocol.technique.md) | The shader \[\[Technique\]\] to choose. |
